channel.title: Can not find path specified
channel.description:
My compiler says [code] @echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_7\bin\javac.exe" -classpath data/deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;data/deps/jython.jar;data/deps/xstream.jar;data/deps/mina.jar;data/deps/mysql.jar;data/deps/poi.jar;data/deps/slf4j.jar;data/deps/slf4j-nop.jardata/deps/xstream.jar -d bin src\server\*.java src\server\core\*.java src\server\core\config\*.java src\server\core\event\*.java src\server\core\event\impl\*.java src\server\core\task\*.java src\server\core\task\impl\*.java src\server\core\tick\*.java src\server\model\content\*.java src\server\model\content\minigames\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\pathfinder\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\combat\*.java src\server\model\players\combat\magic\*.java src\server\model\players\combat\melee\*.java src\server\model\players\combat\range\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\players\randomevents\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\region\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java pause start Build exit[/code]
It's PI what would i need to do, I'm not really sure what the issue is

item.title: Can not find path specified
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

try java.exe" instead of javac.exe" otherwise setup environmental variables http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,557965.msg4081924.html#msg4081924

Read full topic

item.title: Can not find path specified
item.dc:creator: @Taharahora Taharahora
item.description:
@Taharahora wrote:

[quote=“Cmoodo, post:4, topic:463400”]^ jdk1.7.0_07, It was 1.6.0_23 or something before i edited it

When i edit it, when i run i get

The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . . [/quote]

make sure to add or delete the programs (x86) depending on your system

Read full topic

item.title: Can not find path specified
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

What is your JDK version? C:/Program Files/Java … Read the folder that says jdk followed by a string of numbers.

Read full topic

item.title: Can not find path specified
item.dc:creator: @firekill291 firekill291
item.description:
@firekill291 wrote:

[quote=“Cmoodo, post:1, topic:463400”] @echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_7\bin\javac.exe" -classpath data/deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;data/deps/jython.jar;data/deps/xstream.jar;data/deps/mina.jar;data/deps/mysql.jar;data/deps/poi.jar;data/deps/slf4j.jar;data/deps/slf4j-nop.jardata/deps/xstream.jar -d bin src\server\*.java src\server\core\*.java src\server\core\config\*.java src\server\core\event\*.java src\server\core\event\impl\*.java src\server\core\task\*.java src\server\core\task\impl\*.java src\server\core\tick\*.java src\server\model\content\*.java src\server\model\content\minigames\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\pathfinder\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\combat\*.java src\server\model\players\combat\magic\*.java src\server\model\players\combat\melee\*.java src\server\model\players\combat\range\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\players\randomevents\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\region\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java pause start Build exit[/quote]

when you start your compiler its say that or its when you click right>edit?

item.title: Can not find path specified

item.description:
@Cmoodo wrote:

My compiler says

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_7\bin\javac.exe" -classpath data/deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;data/deps/jython.jar;data/deps/xstream.jar;data/deps/mina.jar;data/deps/mysql.jar;data/deps/poi.jar;data/deps/slf4j.jar;data/deps/slf4j-nop.jardata/deps/xstream.jar -d bin src\server\*.java src\server\core\*.java src\server\core\config\*.java src\server\core\event\*.java src\server\core\event\impl\*.java src\server\core\task\*.java src\server\core\task\impl\*.java src\server\core\tick\*.java src\server\model\content\*.java src\server\model\content\minigames\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\pathfinder\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\combat\*.java src\server\model\players\combat\magic\*.java src\server\model\players\combat\melee\*.java src\server\model\players\combat\range\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\players\randomevents\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\region\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java pause start Build exit
